# Git confirmation template

When preparing to modify the repository, ask the user to confirm:
- Branch name (suggested): `dev-<short-desc>`
- Files to change (list)
- Exact git commands to run
- Commit message
- Whether to push and open a PR

Template message
- "I will create branch `dev/<desc>`, edit `file1` and `file2`, commit with
  message `<msg>`. Confirm to proceed."
